LanguageData.Kurin_Overhead_Winter_Hat.description: It is a simple winter hat. Even the cold Kurin makes it easy to spend winter.
LanguageData.Kurin_Overhead_Summer_Hat.description: It is a simple summer hat. Even on a very hot summer day, you can hold it with this hat.
LanguageData.Kurin_Overhead_Casual_Hair_Pin.descripti: It is a casual hairpin. Simply wearing will make you feel energetic.
LanguageData.Kurin_Overhead_Bikini_Armor_Headgear.des: Bikini armor head armor. It's much stronger than it looks.
LanguageData.Kurin_Overhead_Military_Helmet.descripti: Combat grenade with a plaque bulletproof plaque. It's the last thing you can do to stop bullets flying towards your head.
LanguageData.Kurin_Overhead_Cute_Hair_Pin.description: It is a cute fox-shaped hairpin.
